title: Father's Day Steak Add Ons
description: Make dad an outstanding steak this Father's Day with Sam the Cooking Guy's suggested add-ons.

asset.title: Father's Day Steak Add Ons
asset.description: Make dad an outstanding steak this Father's Day with Sam the Cooking Guy's suggested add-ons.
asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Dads are always there for us so this father's day lets be there for them and make him a great steak. Heat a cast iron pan really well, lightly oil and season the steak and cook until seared beautifully and where you want it. You can stop here OR you can top it with a compound butter of herbs, garlic, and lemon zest. How about sauteed mushrooms with butter garlic and soy or simply blue cheese and a good drizzle of extra virgin olive oil. Don't just make the old man a great steak this father's day make him an amazing one.
